forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 65. West wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
